Articles.Content:
I imagine this has not been thought about yet, but I'm curious as to whether there will be an EDU version or at least some sort of support or discounts for educational institutions buying multiple licences.

 

Right now, the library I work in has several EDU licences purchased through Teacher Gaming. However, the KSP EDU version seems to be on the backburner. 

 

It would be great to have a new EDU version that is also better optimized for teaching.

On 8/20/2019 at 5:07 PM, Klapaucius said:

I imagine this has not been thought about yet, but I'm curious as to whether there will be an EDU version or at least some sort of support or discounts for educational institutions buying multiple licences.

 

Right now, the library I work in has several EDU licences purchased through Teacher Gaming. However, the KSP EDU version seems to be on the backburner. 

 

It would be great to have a new EDU version that is also better optimized for teaching.

They would do that but, I think KSP2 has more requirements than school computers can handle and it is much more complex and the original ksp takes the cake for educational purposes.
